item.title: Dblink
item.description: 查询所有触发器 select*fromuser_triggers;根据名称禁用触发器 altertriggerLOGMNRGGC_TRIGGERdisable;查询所有 job select*fromuser_jobs;根据 id 禁用 job BEGINdbms_job.broken(4001,true);END;禁用 oracle dblink altersystemsetopen_links=0sid='$sid'scope=spfile;altersystemsetopen_links_per_instance=0sid='$sid'scope=spfile;启用 oracle dblink
